original_text:
Thus says the Lord:
“Heaven is my throne,
    and the earth is my footstool;
what is the house that you would build for me,
    and what is the place of my rest?
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 하늘은 나의 보좌요 땅은 나의 발판이니 너희가 나를 위하여 무슨 집을 지으랴 내가 안식할 처소가 어디랴

sentences.original_text: and the earth is my footstool;
what is the house that you would build for me,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나를 위하여 짓을 집이 무엇이며

sentences.original_text: and what is the place of my rest?
